4. City Council

City Council
============

Meetings
--------

* 2nd and 4th Thursday of each month
* 6:00p.m.
* City Council Chambers  
  212 Main Street  
  Lake Dallas, TX 75065

Agendas & Minutes
-----------------

Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval.

[View Most Recent Agendas and Minutes](https://www.lakedallas.com/AgendaCenter/City-Council-7)

* ![Kristy Bleau](https://www.lakedallas.com/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=5097)

  Term expires May 2027

1. **City Hall**
   -------------

   212 Main Street  
   Lake Dallas, TX 75065  
   Phone: (940) 497-2226  
      
   **City Hall Hours -**  
   Monday - Thursday  
   7:30 a.m. - 4:30 p.m.  
   Friday  
   7:30 a.m. - 11:00 a.m.  
     
   **Service Window Hours-**  
   Monday - Thursday  
   8:00 a.m. - 4:30 p.m.  
   Friday  
   8:00 a.m. - 11:00 a.m.
